experiences.title: Senior AI Project Manager

seo.metaTitle: Senior AI Project Manager at Ogilvy - Christopher Belgrave
seo.metaDescription: Leading AI-driven advertising campaigns and digital transformation initiatives at Ogilvy.

experiences.description: Leading AI-driven advertising campaigns and digital transformation initiatives for major global brands. Responsible for end-to-end project management of cutting-edge AI implementations in marketing technology.
achievements: Successfully delivered the Maybelline ChromaVerse AR gaming experience, increasing user engagement by 45%
Implemented AI-powered content optimization tools that reduced campaign production time by 30%
Led cross-functional teams of developers, designers, and data scientists to deliver complex AI projects on time and within budget
Pioneered the adoption of machine learning models for customer segmentation and personalized marketing
Managed a portfolio of AI projects with a combined budget of $2.5M annually
Established AI project management best practices adopted across the agency
responsibilities: Lead AI project planning and execution from concept to delivery
Manage cross-functional teams of 8-15 members including developers, designers, and data scientists
Collaborate with clients to define AI strategy and implementation roadmaps
Oversee budget management and resource allocation for AI initiatives
Ensure compliance with data privacy and AI ethics guidelines
Present project outcomes and ROI metrics to C-level executives

experiences.title: Digital Project Manager

seo.metaTitle: Digital Project Manager at Wunderman Thompson - Christopher Belgrave
seo.metaDescription: Managed digital marketing campaigns and web development projects for enterprise clients.

experiences.description: Managed digital marketing campaigns and web development projects for enterprise clients. Specialized in data-driven marketing solutions and interactive web experiences.
achievements: Delivered award-winning website redesign for a Fortune 500 financial services client, improving conversion rates by 25%
Implemented automated reporting dashboards that reduced weekly reporting time by 70%
Managed a portfolio of projects with a combined budget of $1.5M annually
Introduced agile methodologies to the digital project team, improving delivery timelines by 40%
Led the successful migration of 15+ client websites to new CMS platform
Achieved 98% client satisfaction rating across all managed projects
responsibilities: Manage end-to-end delivery of digital marketing campaigns
Coordinate with creative, development, and analytics teams
Maintain client relationships and manage expectations
Oversee project budgets and timelines
Implement quality assurance processes
Report on project performance and ROI metrics

Streamlined project documentation processes, reducing onboarding time for new team members by 50%
Coordinated UAT testing phases across 5 major project releases with zero critical defects
Created technical specification templates that became company standard for all new projects
Managed technical requirements for 12+ concurrent projects
Achieved 100% on-time delivery rate for all coordinated technical milestones
responsibilities: Coordinate technical requirements gathering and documentation
Facilitate communication between business and technical teams
Manage UAT testing processes and defect resolution
Maintain project documentation and technical specifications
Support development teams with resource coordination
Ensure compliance with technical standards and best practices
